comments.body: Based on the documentation `fire` doesn't seem to received any parameters. Could you confirm if this is ok?

@armanio123 not the submitter but also interested in this PR. I believe any arguments is correct and are passed to emit.

https://github.com/nodeshift/opossum/blob/master/lib/circuit.js#L298-L304
@scttcper @armanio123 the PR has merged, but as the author of this (and opossum), this is correct. `fire` receives any arguments and proxies them.
